author: prestonc
msg: Created a little script to build the collection.xml file required by the SAXON parser when running the fn:collection function in XQuery. The collection file just contains a list of all the XML file for fn:collection to process.

author: prestonc
msg: Queries have all been tested on SAXON for proof of correctness and working results. Also try to make them more readable.

author: oheger
msg: This method is no longer needed as the initialization mechanism has been
replaced by another one based on default parameters handlers.

author: prestonc
msg: Missing a parameter in arguments list.

author: oheger
msg: CombinedConfigurationBuilder now uses default handlers for initializing child sources.
The parameters objects for child configuration sources are now initialized
using the DefaultParametersManager obtained from the builder's configuration.
This replaces the previous mechanism based on example parameters objects.
(The new approach is more flexible and in-line with the global defaults
